column14: Description
As a registered user, I wish to manage my reservation so that I can purchase ticket and reach to the destination quickly.
As a staff, I want to manage the bus schedule information so that all the bus schedule will be updated in the first time and the customer can view it.
As a registered user, I can make payment for my reservation so that I can complete my reservation
As a registered user, I can log into the system so that I can use the system for my daily task which is the ticketing service
As a manager, I wish to manage all the staff accounts so that the staff information is up-to-date

A a registered user, I wish to create reservation so that i can purchase the ticket
